mapper.sql: id, interimstudentreportid, testid, externaltestid, taskvariantid, taskvariantexternalid, taskvariantposition, questioninformationid, creditearned, createddate, modifieddate, createduser, modifieduser
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('studentreportquestioninfo_id_seq')
insert into studentreportquestioninfo
id,
interimstudentreportid,
testid,
externaltestid,
taskvariantid,
taskvariantexternalid,
taskvariantposition,
questioninformationid,
creditearned,
createddate,
modifieddate,
createduser,
modifieduser,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{interimStudentReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{testId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{externalTestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update studentreportquestioninfo
interimstudentreportid = #{interimStudentReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
taskvariantposition = #{taskVariantPosition,jdbcType=INTEGER},
questioninformationid = #{questionInformationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creditearned = #{creditEarned,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createddate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifieddate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createduser = #{createdUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifieduser = #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update studentreportquestioninfo set interimstudentreportid = #{interimStudentReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, taskvariantposition = #{taskVariantPosition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, questioninformationid = #{questionInformationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creditearned = #{creditEarned,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createddate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifieddate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createduser = #{createdUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifieduser = #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct srqi.*, qi.questiondescription, qi.creditpercent, cr.categorycode as creditEarnedCode FROM studentreportquestioninfo srqi inner join questioninformation qi on srqi.questioninformationid = qi.id left join category cr on cr.id = srqi.creditearned and cr.activeflag is true where srqi.interimstudentreportid = #{interimStudentReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and qi.activeflag is true order by srqi.taskvariantposition
